greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1 - psi(-q)^3 / psi(-q^3)) / 3 in powers of q where psi() is a Ramanujan theta function.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
Cubic AGM theta functions: a(q) (see A004016), b(q) (A005928), c(q) (A005882).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Expansion of (1 - b(q^2)^2 / b(-q) ) / 3 in powers of q where b() is a cubic AGM function.
a(n) is multiplicative with a(2^e) = -1 unless e=0, a(3^e) = 1, a(p^e) = e + 1 if p == 1 (mod 6), a(p^e) = (1 + (-1)^e) / 2 if p == 5 (mod 6).
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 1, 0, -(-1)^n DivisorSum[n, KroneckerSymbol[ -12, #] &]]; (* _Michael Somos_, May 06 2015 *)
a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ (4 + EllipticTheta[ 2, Pi/4, q^(1/2)]^3 / EllipticTheta[ 2, Pi/4, q^(3/2)]) / 6, {q, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, May 06 2015 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, -(-1)^n * sumdiv(n, d, kronecker(-12, d)))};

(PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( (1 - eta(x + A)^3 * eta(x^4 + A)^3 * eta(x^6 + A) / (eta(x^2 + A)^3 * eta(x^3 + A) * eta(x^12 + A))) / 3, n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, May 06 2015 */
xref: Cf. A035178, A093829, A113447 are same up to sign.
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jan 29 2008
